short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to lock and password protect open tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Locker Room helps you protect your browser tabs with password locks. This extension is designed for privacy-conscious users who want to restrict access to open tabs, either temporarily or continuously, preventing unauthorised viewing or interaction.

It is open-source: https://github.com/The-x-35/tab-locker-room

Features:
- Lock tabs instantly with a password
- Easily configure or change the lock password in settings
- Blurs and protects the tab content, requiring the correct password for access
- User-friendly interface with simple settings and secure functionality

Use Cases:
- Keep work-related tabs private on shared or public computers
- Protect tabs while multitasking to prevent unintended access
- Great for securing sensitive information temporarily

Get started with Tab Locker Room today for a secure browsing experience!
